children.specification: A smooth matte light gray floor panel with consistent flat surface, minimal texture for a professional showroom appearance.
A modern exhibition wall panel, rectangular shape, smooth white surface with slim metallic gray edge trim, minimalistic design.

objects.specification: A large rectangular exhibition booth structure with four vertical walls and a floor, forming a spacious indoor space sized to accommodate a demo car and visitor circulation. The walls are made of sleek white panels supported by slim metallic gray columns, featuring minimalistic modern styling. The floor is a smooth matte finish in light gray, providing a consistent professional showroom look.

A sleek modern car model with aerodynamic body, metallic blue paint finish, glossy surfaces, sporty wheels with detailed alloy rims, tinted windows, and realistic LED headlights and taillights. The car should reflect a high-end concept design for an indoor showroom environment with accurate scale and proportions.

A modern reception desk with clean lines, white lacquered rectangular surface, slim metallic support frame in brushed aluminum finish, integrated LED strip lighting under the countertop, suitable for visitor check-in in a car showroom.

A vertical brochure display stand with slender metallic chrome frame and a transparent acrylic brochure holder at torso height, stable rectangular base, featuring minimalistic modern styling suited for displaying car specifications or marketing materials.

A vertical brochure display stand with slender metallic chrome frame and a transparent acrylic brochure holder at torso height, stable rectangular base, featuring minimalistic modern styling suited for displaying car specifications or marketing materials.
A decorative rectangular banner with car brand logo printed in bold color on premium fabric, mounted flush to the wall with hidden brackets, featuring a slightly glossy finish.
A decorative rectangular banner with car brand logo printed in bold color on premium fabric, mounted flush to the wall with hidden brackets, featuring a slightly glossy finish.

children.specification: A small round table with a smooth white tabletop and slender metallic legs in brushed steel finish, height suitable for seated discussion.

objects.specification: A casual visitor seating area composed of two small round tables and four chairs, arranged in a conversational layout, featuring modern minimalist design with sleek surfaces. The tables have circular white tabletops and slender metallic legs, while the chairs have upholstered cushions in neutral gray fabric with powder-coated steel frames.
A small cylindrical soft LED pendant light fixture suspended from the ceiling, with warm white light output, matte white housing, diffused lens for uniform illumination of the car surface.
